headerDisplay: TPLink Smart Home Plugin for Homebridge.

addCustomCharacteristics.title: Add Custom Characteristics (For energy monitoring in Eve app)

pollingInterval.description: How often to check device status in the background (seconds)

inUseThreshold.description: For plugs that support energy monitoring (HS110), min power draw for OutletInUse (Watts)

broadcast.title: Broadcast Address
broadcast.description: If discovery is not working tweak to match your subnet, eg: 192.168.0.255.

waitTimeUpdate.description: The time to wait to combine similar commands for a device before sending a command to a device. Default: 100.

macAddresses.title: Whitelisted Devices
macAddresses.description: Allow-list of mac addresses to include. If specified will ignore other devices. Supports glob-style patterns

excludeMacAddresses.title: Blacklisted Devices
excludeMacAddresses.description: Deny-list of mac addresses to exclude. Supports glob-style patterns

layout.title: Advanced Settings
layout.description: Don't change these, unless you understand what you're doing.

items.helpvalue: Additional settings to include/exclude devices and to filter devices types etc. are available. Please see the plugin README for further information.
